question: Which union ministry is organizing the Destination North East (NE) in Varanasi?
option2: Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region
answer: Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region
explanation: The Destination North East (NE) Festival is being organized by the Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region (DoNER) in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh on 23rd November 2019. The 4-day festival will showcase art, culture, cuisine, handicrafts and handlooms of the northeastern region. During the festival, the visitors will have live experience of the artisans and artistes from the Northeast working on their looms and crafts, performing their songs and dances in the open stage.
